attributes.long-description:
FINAL FANTASY X and FINAL FANTASY X-2 are back—in HD! FINAL FANTASY X was first released in 2001 on the PlayStation®2 system, and its sequel, FINAL FANTASY X-2, in 2003. Widely acclaimed for their moving stories and spectacular graphics, the two titles have returned as an HD remaster set. Characters, monsters, and environments have been fine-tuned to HD detail, providing a richer, deeper FINAL FANTASY visual experience. Other new features in the HD version include remastered/rearranged BGM, International Edition content, trophies, and Cross-Save functionality.

1 player
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i, 1080p
DUALSHOCK®3

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).  Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.sonyenteretainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.

© 2001-2004, 2013, 2014 SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD. All Rights Reserved.
CHARACTER DESIGN: TETSUYA NOMURA
FINAL FANTASY, SQUARE ENIX and the SQUARE ENIX logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of Square Enix Holdings Co., Ltd.

FINAL FANTASY X and FINAL FANTASY X-2 NOT SOLD SEPARATELY.
attributes.name: FINAL FANTASY X/X-2 HD Remaster
